trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around August 15th 1992
divs: Sighting DetailsI lived in Las Vegas at the time, and was sitting in my room, which incedentaly was pointed toward the mountain ranges..It was about 11pm and I saw a very bright light hovering.. It just seemed to sit there.. Then very eraticaly it made a number of very fast, and very precise maneuvers. It went up, down, left, right, horizontal etc.. but always seemed to be in a for lack of a better word, a box I suppose, in other words it allways stayed within this physical space. I watched this for probably 20-30 minutes, and it finally shot off almost instantly upwards..I realize that area 51 is right there, and it was certainly in that vacinity. That said, i dont know if it was "Alien" or if it is a VERY advanced air craft that the US has designed, and built.. either way, I have never again seen anything in the sky behave in that manner.. It was truly awe inspiring.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Erratic flying, up, down, left right, very fast, very precise.
